newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: UnionBank sees Q2 net about 300 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: UnionBank sees Q2 net about 300 mln pesos.

text.p: Union Bank of the Philippines is expected to register a net income of around 300 million pesos in the second quarter of the year, a bank official said on Tuesday.
"The estimate is around 300 million pesos," the official told Reuters.
The bank posted a 300.2 million peso net income in the first three months of the year.
Last year, the bank posted a 501.46 million peso net income in the first six months of the year.
The income statement is expected to be released either on Tuesday or Wednesday.
